name: 王伯雅
objective: 課程重點：(1)藉由適合其程度的教材加強學生必備的基礎文法觀念和句型結構；(2)使學生確切把握閱讀要領以及充分瞭解寫作的各種技巧，重心在生字、片語、句法的解釋和基本寫作技巧的分析；(3)熟悉英語人士日常生活情境及與學生將來就業環境相關之會話及適當之應對方式；(4)透過練習加強聽、說、讀、寫的知能及表達。
schedule:
Week 1 	Orientation Unit 1
Week 2 	Extended Practice Unit 1 & Unit 2
Week 3 	Extended Practice Unit 2
Week 4 	Unit 3
Week 5    Extended Practice Unit 3
Week 6 	Unit 4
Week 7 	Extended Practice Unit 4
Week 8 	Project Discussion +Practical English
Week 9 	Schoolwide Proficiency Test
Week 10 	Unit 5
Week 11 	Extended Practice Unit 5
Week 12 	Unit 6
Week 13 	Extended Practice Unit 6
Week 14 	Project Discussion +Practical English
Week 15 	Group Presentation
Week 16 	Review
Week 17 	Textbook Exam
Week 18 	Schoolwide Proficiency Test
scorePolicy:
Class attendance (15%) 
	 Quiz and in-class participation (20%): Vocabulary+ Dialogue+ In-class activity
	 Final Project (20%: within-group evaluation 10%)
	 Exams (45%): Textbook Final Exam 15% +Midterm 15% +Final 15%
materials: Material: Aspire (Pre-Intermediate Student’s Book) 東華
